Contact Us

Contact Us

OCC Transport's Contact Info

Curious where to find us, call us, or send a fax to?


Office Location:

University Union West-B20 (UUW-B20)


Fall and Spring Office Hours:

Monday-Friday: 9 A.M. to 5 P.M.


Winter and Summer Office Hours:

Monday-Friday: 9 A.M. to 4 P.M.


Phone Number:

607-777-6989


Fax Number:

607-777-6990



Lost an Item on the Bus?

If you lose your personal items while riding with us:


Same Day: You can ask a driver if they have seen your lost item and if you can search their bus for your lost item, but please do not ask them to radio around for your lost item as this is against company policy.


Business Day(s) After: After our buses finish service for the day, all found items will be collected and given to the University Police Department's Lost and Found.


UPD's Lost and Found is located at the basement of the Couper Administration Building on campus.


Contact Us Form

Have a general question, complaint, or a compliment?


Fill out the form below, and if applicable, we will get back to you as soon as possible.


NOTE: If you are reporting a LOST ITEM, please refer to the "Lost an Item on the Bus?" section here. Please do not use this form to report lost items.

* is a required field.
